name: Made in the Deep
description:
1.1 fixes: Mushrooms could be eaten while dead, the jump in lvl 3 was unintentionally hard. The original LD48 submission can be found below as html1.0.zip

Going up can lead to nasty developments; you have to go deeper.

Click the game to start. Controls: Left & Right arrow keys to walk, Up/Space/Z to jump.

Mushrooms let you get higher.
